Takes some time to break it in. It’s made tight, cards go in but they are very hard to pull out until you get it broken in.

I bought this for a young family friend of mine who is about to start driving. He was so excited! I bought a similar product for my husband and he was talking about it for days afterwards of how much he loved how thin and lightweight it was. He put everything from his old wallet into this one, and the new one was still half the size as the old.
Love the wallet it has held up really good so far.

评论概述: Couldn't they have made it a few millimeters wider to properly accomodate US currency?
评论详情: As someone else mentioned, the wallet doesn't accommodate US currency unless you fold the bills in half and shove them to one side or another of the bill area. All Supervek needed to do was to make it a few millimeters wider so you wouldn't have to do this and then be able to select the bills you want without having to take them all out. I'm hoping it stretches out over time due to use and overcomes this limitation.  Otherwise, it is a very light and thin wallet.

The wallet is tall and not wide so they don't accommodate US currency unless you fold the bills in half and shove them to one side or another of the bill area. Still, very slim and space for a lot of credit/other cards without creating a huge bulge in your pocket.
